Stay in control of your data and processes

The days of simple task scheduling are over. Leverage advanced IT automation and orchestration capabilities to maintain uninterrupted cross-departmental processes.

Complex workflow management

Features like load balancing, dashboards and a REST API adapter help you accommodate larger volumes of jobs and data.

Pre-built job steps library

Anyone on your IT team can quickly and easily spin up automation — no development expertise or custom scripting required.

Drag-and-drop user interface

A low-code/no-code GUI and endless options for time- and event-based triggers allow for faster workflow development.

Convenient self-service portal

Easily accessible jobs and plans eliminate bottlenecks by giving your business users timely data without delay.

Real-time SLA monitoring and alerts

Issue notification is just the beginning — dynamically provision resources and meet SLAs without manual intervention.

Intelligent workload scalability

Heuristic Queue Allocation and automatic Health Check scans offer ways to continuously improve performance despite increasing workloads.

Achieve unprecedented efficiency

No matter how talented your team is, they can't beat the efficiency potential of automation. Workload automation (WLA) simplifies connection and orchestration across your entire business and IT landscape.

With WLA tools, you can:

  • Implement and automate end-to-end processes with infinite extensibility, connecting all business systems and applications.
  • Amplify efficiency with swift workflow deployment and custom roles for business users to access their automation workflows.
  • Ensure complete control with total process management and visibility in a single platform with predictive SLAs and alerts.
 Learn the Benefits of WLA

Support any IT environment

ActiveBatch provides advanced enterprise workload automation and job scheduling capabilities for your infrastructure — on-premises, cloud or hybrid cloud.

Implement complete business process automation by connecting your Microsoft apps suite, HR platforms and enterprise resource management (ERP), business process management (BPM) and BI tools.

Achieve true multi-cloud orchestration by linking on-premises data centers with cloud vendors, including VMware, Amazon EC2 and Microsoft Azure.

Secure your data at rest and in transit with managed file transfer (MFT), SFTP and FTPS protocols, plus advanced file event triggers and parallel transfer capabilities for batch processes.

 Explore Cloud Infrastructure Orchestration

"[ActiveBatch] saves us time when setting up the jobs, and it saves us time when troubleshooting because we know exactly what the job is doing."

Read the case study

Manage growing data volumes

ActiveBatch offers advanced features for handling large data sets, improving data quality, data reporting and simplifying data warehousing through:

  • Event-driven architecture and constraint-based scheduling for easy management of warehouse and ETL processes
  • Granular permissions, audit trails, transformation rules and more to standardize auditing and governance
  • Connectors for big data/ Hadoop ecosystems, Microsoft SQL and Oracle databases, Informatica and other ETL tools
 See More About Data Automation with WLA

Meet every SLA

WLA can prevent service-level agreement (SLA) violations. ActiveBatch prioritizes SLA-marked jobs, allocating additional compute resources and allowing them to proceed to execution before less important jobs in the queue. It also increases the OS priority of workflows that exceed a defined percentage of their expected or historical runtimes.

Over time, ActiveBatch learns which execution queues fit the needs of your SLA-dependent workflows.

 Improve SLA Performance

Freedom to integrate

ActiveBatch integrates with virtually any cloud platform or operating system (Windows, OS, Linux, UNIX and more).

Pre-built integrations and extensions, plus the flexibility to build your own via REST API, support scores of use cases across business and IT functions.

 Explore All Integrations and Extensions

Enterprise WLA software FAQs

What is workload automation (WLA) software?

Workload automation (WLA) software is a comprehensive solution designed to manage, schedule and automate workflows and processes across diverse systems, applications and environments. By streamlining manual, repetitive tasks, WLA software helps organizations improve operational efficiency, reduce errors and ensure the consistent execution of critical business and IT processes.

Workload automation solutions can provide no-code/low-code workflow development for DevOps, plus real-time batch monitoring, alerting, auto-remediation, script lifecycle management tools and much more.
Learn more about workload automation capabilities.
How does WLA software integrate with my environment?

There are workload automation solutions that integrate with virtually any application or technology. This can be accomplished with universal connectors, direct integrations or REST APIs and web services. Integrations, APIs and scripts can be turned into reusable jobs for reliable end-to-end processes across on-premises and cloud environments (SaaS, PaaS or IaaS).

ActiveBatch, for example, provides extensions for tools like IBM, Oracle, Microsoft and SAP.
Explore how you can build your own integrations using the Super REST API Adapter.
What is ActiveBatch workload automation?

ActiveBatch by Redwood is a workload automation and enterprise job scheduling solution known for its ease of use, event-based automation and scalability. It allows users to build and monitor automated processes that orchestrate data center workflows, IT operations and infrastructure tasks, business applications, batch jobs and more.

With programmatic integrations and low-code API accessibility, users can coordinate data, dependencies and resources between IT and other departments. Thus, ActiveBatch reduces the complexity of an IT infrastructure and helps all kinds of teams meet business needs.

See what you can accomplish with ActiveBatch\'s WLA and scheduling tools.
